        </div>

            <div class="advWeatherInner">
                <span class="advConditions intermittent-clouds-04">
                    <span class="advTemp"></span>
                </span>
            </div>
        </div>

        
        <div id="adv_weather_main" class="advDropdown advLayer">
            <div class="advPanelArrow"></div>
            <div class="advDropdownOuter">
                <div class="advDropdownInner">
                    <div class="advMainMenuLink" data-state="1"><div class="prev"><a href="#"></a></div>Back to Main Menu</div>
                    <div id="adv_weather_inner">
                        <div class="advClose" data-state="4"><span class="advToprailIcon ir">Close</span></div>

                        <form id="adv_wlocation_form">
                            <div class="title">Customize Your Weather</div>
                            <div>
                                <label for="adv_wlocation_input">Set Your Location:</label>

                            <div class="advFrmBtn"><input type="submit" value="Submit" /></div>
                        </form>

                        <div id="adv_wlocation_confirm">
                            <div class="title">Congratulations!</div>
                            <div>Your weather is set to <span class="advGeoChoosen"></span>. You can change the location at any time.</div>
                            <div class="advFrmBtn">
                                <input class="adv-tray_link" data-state="4" data-phase="phase3" type="button" value="Done" />
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div id="adv_weather_data">
                            <div class="subtitle">AccuWeather.com Quick Look</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="adunit nomobilead" id="SponsorRight"></div>
    </div>

    
    <div id="adv_mast_right">

    
    <div id="adv_search" class="advToprailBtn" data-state="6">

    function getToprailVersion() { return 1; }

                <!-- headline - wide -->	
<!-- Premium Blog -->

<!-- /Premium Blog -->
<h1>Patriots 2001 Super Bowl ring, Rob Gronkowski's Deflategate gloves up for auction</h1>
<div class="clearfix"></div>
<!-- /headline -->

                                data-thumb="http://image.masslive.com/home/mass-media/pgthumb/img/republican/photo/2017/02/07/-1342192677287b99.jpg" 
                                data-author="cmarion"
                                data-author-username="Chris Marion"
                                data-tags=""
                                data-keywords=""
                                data-moderate=""
                                data-authorlink="http://connect.masslive.com/staff/cmarion/photos.html"
                                data-buy="http://masslive.mycapture.com/mycapture/remoteimage.asp?backtext=Return%20to%20the%20photo%20gallery&backurl=http%3A%2F%2Fphotos.masslive.com%2Frepublican%2F2017%2F02%2Fnew_england_patriots_parade_through_downtown_boston_75.html&image=http%3A%2F%2Fmedia.masslive.com%2Frepublican%2Fphoto%2F2017%2F02%2F07%2F22025570-standard.jpg&pricingsheetid=&caption=%3Cp%3EPhotos%20from%20the%20New%20England%20Patriots%202017%20Super%20Bowl%20victory%20celebration%20in%20Boston%20on%20February%207%2C%202017.%20%28Chris%20Marion%20%2F%20The%20Republican%29%3C%2Fp%3E&affphotographername=Chris%20Marion" >
                </span>

			<span class="author vcard"><a class="bl" id="name_author" href="http://connect.masslive.com/user/HeatherAdams/posts.html">
	
		
	
	
	
	
	Heather Adams | Hadams@masslive.com

<span style="display:none; visibility:hidden;">masslive.com</span>
		<br /> <a id="twitter_author" href="https://twitter.com/HeatherAdams44" target="_blank">Follow on Twitter</a>
	




	<br/>on February 22, 2017 at  1:15 PM, updated <span class="updated" title="2017-02-22T18:20:16Z">February 22, 2017 at  1:20 PM</span>
	<div id="sponsor_tablet">

                    <script type="text/javascript">

   Advance.Gigya.settings.page = {
            'title':'Patriots 2001 Super Bowl ring, Rob Gronkowski\'s Deflategate gloves up for auction',
            'link':'http://blog.masslive.com/patriots/2017/02/patriots_2001_super_bowl_ring.html',
            'desc': 'Looking to add to your sports memorabilia collection? Lelands.com\'s winter auction has some unique Patriots and Celtics collectables. ',
	    'thumbnail': 'http://media.masslive.com/republican/photo/2017/02/07/22020134-large.jpeg'
   };

</script>



                    
                    
                    
                    <div id="article_inset">
                      <div id="story-package" >
                        <!-- series -->


<!-- /series -->

 <!-- Aka Story Package -->
                        <!-- gallery-preview -->
<!-- /gallery-preview -->
 <!-- Aka Secondary Package -->
                        <div class="adunit nomobilead" id="StoryAd"></div>

                      </div><!-- /storypackage -->
                    </div><!-- /#article_inset -->
                    <!-- Article -->
	
	<div class="entry-content">

		
		<div class="ndn_embed" id="ndn-video-player-1" data-config-distributor-id="90298"></div>

		<p>Looking to add to your sports&nbsp;memorabilia collection? Lelands.com's winter auction&nbsp;has some unique New England Patriots and Boston Celtics collectibles.&nbsp;</p>
<p>One of the items is <a href="http://lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=82817" target="_blank">Rob Gronkowski's gloves</a>&nbsp;he wore during the&nbsp;2015 AFC Championship Game between the Patriots and the Indianapolis Colts, also commonly known as the Deflategate game. If that isn't enough to grab your attention, both gloves are signed. According to the website, the item starts&nbsp;$2,500.</p>
<p>According to the website, the item starts&nbsp;$2,500.</p>
<p>Lelands.com also sold the&nbsp;"Deflategate" ball in a previous auction for $43,923.&nbsp;</p>
<p>"This is a highly unusual opportunity to own a piece of one of the great sports controversies of the modern era," the website says.</p>
<p>Another Patriots item in the winter auction is a <a href="http://lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=83372" target="_blank">2001 Patriots Super Bowl ring</a>. The ring originally belonged to one of the longest tenured employees in Patriots history, George Boyajian, according to the website. According to the website, the item started at $5,000 but with 23 days left of bidding it is already past $7,000.&nbsp;</p>
<p>If you're more of a Celtics fan, <a href="http://lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=83422" target="_blank">Lelands.com</a>&nbsp;is also auctioning off the&nbsp;1964 Boston Celtics 7 Times World Champions Award. It was originally presented to&nbsp;Frank Ramsey, who was considered the first "sixth man" in NBA history. This item starts at $2,000.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The winter auction runs until March 17.</p>
<p>The most sought after sports&nbsp;memorabilia piece right now, however, is still on the run -- Tom Brady's <a href="http://topics.masslive.com/tag/tom-brady-jersey/" target="_blank">Super Bowl 51 jersey</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>But, as&nbsp;Josh Evans, owner and founder of&nbsp;<a href="http://lelands.com/" target="_blank">Lelands.com</a>, told <a href="http://blog.masslive.com/patriots/2017/02/how_much_is_tom_bradys_super_b.html" target="_blank">MassLive</a>&nbsp;in an earlier interview, that item is "unsellable."&nbsp;</p>
<p><a href="http://blog.masslive.com/patriots/2017/02/tom_bradys_missing_patriots_je.html" target="_blank" data-enhanced="small">Read Tom Brady's missing Patriots jersey police report: Authorities say it's worth $500K</a></p>
<style type="text/css"><!--
p.p1 {margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px; font: 12.0px 'Times New Roman'} span.s1 {font-kerning: none}
--></style>
<style type="text/css"><!--
p.p1 {margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px; font: 12.0px 'Times New Roman'} span.s1 {font-kerning: none}
--></style>
		
		

		
		<div class="ndn_embed" id="ndn-video-player-2" data-config-distributor-id="90298"></div>

	</div>
<!-- /Article -->
